title: Stud Unleashed: Barry
description: Successful, not-so-great-with-the-ladies, and all around nice guy Barry Furnukle can’t believe his luck when Amber Lewis agrees to date him. But when his attempt to woo her with the world’s most “awesome” date (birding and fro-yo) lands him in the friend zone, he wonders if a guy like him ever had a chance.  On advice from his ladies’ man brother, Barry returns to his acting roots for a little confidence rehab. Suddenly he’s got more female attention than he knows what to do with. But will his new found popularity make him happy? Or will he finally release his inner stud to win the woman he can’t forget?  The Clover Park STUDS Series Book .5:Almost Dating Book 1: Almost in Love Book 2: Almost MarriedBook 3: Almost Over It
author: Kylie Gilmore
